verses.text: \w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* brought back \w the|strong="H3068"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sion, we became \w like|strong="H3808"\w* men comforted.

\w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* mouth filled \w with|strong="H3068"\w* gladness; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w with|strong="H3068"\w* joy. \w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* say \w among|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Gentiles: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath done great things \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w* hath \w done|strong="H3027"\w* great \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*: \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* become joyful.

Turn again \w our|strong="H3068"\w* captivity, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stream \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* south.
\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* sow \w in|strong="H5921"\w* tears \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* reap \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w*.
Going they went and wept, casting their seeds.
But coming they shall come with joyfulness, carrying their sheaves.
